title: Being a Phoenix
teaser: One in ten college students goes to a for-profit college. Schools like the University of Phoenix have been scrutinized for […]
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

One in ten college students goes to a for-profit college. Schools like the University of Phoenix have been scrutinized for aggressive recruiting and other questionable practices. But many students say the University of Phoenix offered them a kind of education they couldn’t get anywhere else.

","type":"text/html"},{"type":"text/html","content":"

contentencoded: One in ten college students goes to a for-profit college. Schools like the University of Phoenix have been scrutinized for aggressive recruiting and other questionable practices. But many students say the University of Phoenix offered them a kind of education they couldn’t get anywhere else.
